title: Mean Value Theorem in tabular form

content.question: x 3 4 5 6 7 f(x) 20 17 12 16 20 The function f is continuous and differentiable on the closed interval [3, 7]. The table above gives selected values of f on this interval. Which of the following statements must be true? The minimum value off on [3, 7] is 12.
